table.caption: Table 110 – Font types
head: Type
Subtype Value
Description
rows: (PDF 1.2) A composite font—a font composed of glyphs from a descendant CIDFont
A font that defines glyph shapes using Type 1 font technology.
A multiple master font—an extension of the Type 1 font that allows the generation of a wide variety of typeface styles from a single font
A font that defines glyphs with streams of PDF graphics operators
A font based on the TrueType font format
(PDF 1.2) A CIDFont whose glyph descriptions are based on Type 1 font technology
(PDF 1.2) A CIDFont whose glyph descriptions are based on TrueType font technology
